text: [Ej pajomʙar, ashoʙat] Az tu mepursand, ci ciz ʙarojaşon halol şudaast. Bigū: "Cizhoi pokiza ʙarojaton halol gaştaast va [hamcunin] on ci ʙa kumaki hajvonoti şikorī [ʙa dast meovared, caro], ki onhoro ʙo on ci Alloh taolo ʙa şumo omūxtaast, dastomūz mekuned. Pas, az on ci [xud naxūrdaand va] ʙaroi şumo giriftaand, ʙixūred va [ʙa hangomi zaʙh jo firistodani hajvonoti şikorī] nomi Allohro ʙar on ʙiʙared va az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]. Be gumon, Alloh taolo dar hisoʙrasī sare' ast
